name: Clean Money
description:
Avoid the IRS at all costs! They want your money and you're not gonna let them have it. You're peter, a man who is struggling to get through life running his own launderette. His wife has left him, and he's struggling to make rent. So, for one day, he must embezzle as much money as possible. Collect your customers money and avoid the agents who have been tipped off to your devious deeds.

Controls -

WASD - Movement

E - Interact/Repair
